column5: Little Turtle Lake is located 50 miles east of Fort Frances and north of Mine Centre. Planning a trip last week of June. Anyone ever fished this lake ? any information would be greatly appreciated. I did a search but limited info.
I don't know anything about the lake, but I have a map and this was the information contained on it:Not sure that helps much. I can put the map up if you want it.Have a good trip!
